name: places/ChIJbyzPedBZwokRI7AAG9TjulI
adrFormatAddress: 831 Broadway, New York, NY 10003-4729, USA

originalText.text:
We were so fortunate to be able to work closely with Eirik as we searched for a new home, completed our purchase of one, and sold our co-op apartment. Eirik was the kind, enthusiastic, and supportive partner we needed.

His attention to details, his ability to build relationships with other brokers, and his guidance and knowledge on the market and real estate standards were invaluable. He took the time to understand our goals and concerns and never pushed us in a direction in which we were uncomfortable.

While we were working together to sell our home, he relieved so much work and stress for us. We were deeply thankful and always felt we were in good hands. When it came to purchasing a home, we were continuously impressed with how he guided us through the steps of making an offer, negotiating terms, and building a relationship with a legal team.

His skills were continuously apparent to us throughout both the process of buying and selling, and we couldn't be more grateful to have worked with him.

Brenna & Nick, Brooklyn

originalText.text: I’ve found 4 different apartments in 4 years in NYC, and working with Eirik on my last apartment was the first and only time I ever felt like I was working with a kind, honest broker who actually cared. Very responsive and helpful throughout - but for a job moving us out of the city, I would ask Eirik first for help in finding our next place. I highly recommend him to anyone looking for help in the tough waters of NYC rentals.

originalText.text: I was so impressed with how Eirik represented the seller when I purchased my new apartment that I asked him to represent me in selling my prior apartment. Eirik’s diligence and outside-the-box thinking were crucial in closing both transactions, which faced the unique challenges of the COVID-era.
